query: SELECT id, userId, sourceType, fileName, LEFT(content, 200) as content_preview, LENGTH(content) as content_length, sourceUrl, status, createdAt FROM knowledge_bases WHERE sourceType IN ('webpage', 'webpage_llm', 'text', 'faq') ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20;
